name: Alex Thompson
bio: Recent UNB Computer Science graduate with a passion for building modern web applications. Completed internships at two local tech companies and built several personal projects including an e-commerce platform and a task management app.

name: Sarah Chen
bio: Experienced full-stack developer specializing in backend systems and database architecture. 5 years of professional experience building scalable web applications. Looking for contract opportunities where I can leverage my expertise in API development.

name: Mike Leblanc
bio: Red Seal certified welder with 12 years of experience in industrial and commercial fabrication. Specialized in structural steel and precision welding. Recently completed advanced TIG welding certification. Strong safety record and attention to detail.

name: Jennifer Walsh
bio: Skilled carpenter with Red Seal certification and 8 years of experience in residential and commercial construction. Expertise in custom finish work, cabinet installation, and renovation projects. Available for both large projects and smaller contract work.

name: David Martinez
bio: Retail management professional with 10+ years of experience leading teams in fast-paced environments. Proven track record of increasing sales, managing inventory systems, and building strong customer relationships. Seeking management role in Fredericton area.

name: Emma MacKenzie
bio: Enthusiastic STU student seeking part-time customer service work. 2 years of experience in retail and food service. Excellent communication skills, reliable, and available for weekend and evening shifts. Strong work ethic and quick learner.
education: BA in Progress, St. Thomas University (Year 3)

name: Rachel Foster
bio: Creative graphic designer and photographer with 4 years of professional experience. Specialized in brand identity, marketing materials, and digital design. Strong portfolio working with local businesses. Comfortable with both print and digital projects.

name: Jordan Campbell
bio: Digital content creator and social media specialist with expertise in growing brand presence across platforms. 3 years of experience managing social accounts for tourism and hospitality businesses. Strong video editing skills and understanding of platform algorithms.

name: Thomas Nguyen
bio: Experienced chef with 7 years in fine dining and casual restaurants. Red Seal certified with expertise in contemporary Canadian cuisine and farm-to-table cooking. Strong leadership skills and passion for mentoring junior kitchen staff.
education: Culinary Arts Diploma, NBCC 2018 + Red Seal

name: Lisa Henderson
bio: Detail-oriented office manager with 15+ years of experience in small business administration. Proficient in bookkeeping, payroll, scheduling, and customer relations. Experience with QuickBooks and various office management software. Excellent organizational skills.

name: Marcus Brown
bio: Outdoor enthusiast and certified guide with 5 years of experience leading kayaking, hiking, and cultural tours. Wilderness First Aid certified. Strong knowledge of New Brunswick history and ecology. Engaging storyteller and passionate about sharing the outdoors with others.

name: Patricia Sullivan
bio: Retired small business owner with 25+ years of entrepreneurial experience. Successfully built and sold two businesses in Fredericton. Now offering consulting and mentoring services to help new entrepreneurs navigate business challenges. Flexible hourly or project-based work.
